meanings.definition: A spherical object used in sports.
meanings.sent1: I kicked the balls during the soccer game.
meanings.sent2: The basketball players dribbled the balls down the court.
meanings.sent3: The tennis balls were having a fun time bouncing around.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, bouncing off the walls like balls.
meanings.sent5: The shiny balls glistened under the stadium lights.

meanings.sent1: He showed great balls when facing his fears.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's balls were evident as he ran into the burning building.
meanings.sent3: The little dog barked loudly, thinking he had big balls.
meanings.sent4: She faced the challenge with balls of steel, never backing down.
meanings.sent5: His balls shone through as he stood up for what was right.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined his balls during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: The boxer felt the pain in his stomach after a hit to the balls.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about getting hit in the balls, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: He winced in pain, feeling like someone had kicked him in the balls.
meanings.sent5: The athlete protected his balls during the intense match.
